import React from 'react' const Minusbox = (props) => { // minusbox的開關 const minusbox_disappear=props.minusbox_switch?"":"disappear" useEffect(() => { set_plusbox_data({ name: plusbox_name, shop: "", price: plusbox_price, today_date: plusbox_today_date, note: plusbox_note, }) }, [plusbox_name, plusbox_price, plusbox_price, plusbox_note]) const post_plusbox_data_function = () => { const post_plusbox_data = axios.post("http://localhost:8080/postData", plusbox_data) props.set_plusbox_switch(false) } return (

新增支出

名稱:
店名:
價格:
日期:
備註:
) } export default Minusbox
